content: the ocean s breath market bag is your new go-to shopping tote for all your farmer s market adventures this elegant design features some simple lacework eye-catching star stitches and sturdy i-cord edge and straps the ocean s breath market bag is a part of the macrame-inspired ocean s breath collection this bag is made with dishie cotton from wecrochet you will need approx 2 5 skeins of dishie or about 440 yds of worsted weight cotton yarn note it is helpful to have a knitting needle or cable needle available for the i-cord handle
